oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: |han=kass'o (Klein Jantje) (VIII)
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The mother springbok makes sounds to her kid as she travels and the young springbok responds: the mothers grunt and the kids bleat. 1) p.7239v: a note which suggests that hunters or others imitate the sounds of the springbok, 2) This story is found in Book VIII-14.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Lucy Lloyd |xam notebooks
oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Springbok ewes and lamb's cries
